title: City Of Rocks National Reserve: Restaurants
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping     Restaurants              Restaurants       Local Area Restaurants - Almo, Idaho: The Almo Creek Outpost - breakfast, burgers, sandwiches, salads, pie, beer, steak, lodging. 208-824-5577 Rock City Mercantile - pizza, sandwiches, pop, beer, camping supplies. 208-824-5510
